p: The free listing of birds was analyzed using a cognitive salience index, the Sutrop index, which combines the frequency and the order of mention of a bird [ 48]. The index was calculated from the following formula: S = F / ( NmP); where F is the frequency of mention of each bird, N is the total number of respondents, and mP the average position of mention of bird [ 48]. Calculations were performed with the Flares program (Free list analysis under R environment using Shiny).
